name: Decoda Health
long_description:
Imagine a bustling medical practice where the front desk is overwhelmed by endless phone calls, scheduling mishaps, and tedious payment processing. In the midst of the chaos, Decoda Health emerges like a trusted partner.

Our complete AI platform handles calls, manage appointments, process payments, and even communicate with patientsâ€”all in one seamless flow. With its multi-language support, Decoda Health ensures every patient feels heard, no matter where they're from. The result? Healthcare providers reclaim precious time, reduce costs, and devote their energy to what truly matters: delivering exceptional care.
one_liner: AI-powered platform automating medical practice operations
